snippet: The killings at two clinics, with similarities to attacks that killed nine women in Pakistan, presented another setback for the global effort to eradicate polio.
abstract: Officials in Nigeria say at least nine polio immunization workers were shot to death in northern Nigeria by gunmen who attacked two clinics; killings present another setback for global effort to eradicate polio.

byline.contributor: Aminu Abubakar contributed reported from Kano, Nigeria.

lead_paragraph: The killings at two clinics, with similarities to attacks that killed nine women in Pakistan, presented another setback for the global effort to eradicate polio.

headline.seo: In Nigeria, Polio Vaccine Workers Are Killed by Gunmen
headline.main: Gunmen Kill Nigerian Polio Vaccine Workers in Echo of Pakistan Attacks
headline.print_headline: Gunmen Kill Nigerian Polio Vaccine Workers in Echo of Pakistan Attacks
